fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check a person each night for being the *Snail Gambler*

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When rolled, a random other player will be rerolled into being the *Snail Gambler*
- You cannot be killed by anyone besides yourself.
- If you visit the *Snail Gambler* or vice versa, both you and the *Snail Gambler* will be killed.
